name: Eons (bluenorther)
description:
Create entire worlds in your computer! EONS is a simulator that aims to replicate the spread of the human species across a virtual globe. Generate worlds, place cultures down, and watch them grow, change, and spread across the land! 

Featuring

- Cultures that grow, interact with each other, and diversify over time.

- A fully simulated world with biomes based on temperature and precipitation.

- Tools to shape the environment to play out any scenario you want!

Controls:

Space + Click -- Place culture on tile

D + Click -- Delete culture from tile

Q + Click -- Raise selected tile elevation

W + Click -- Lower selected tile elevation

---- Experimental  - Set these and then make sure time is passing ----

[  - Begin warming the world

] - Begin cooling the world

; - Begin increasing global precipitation

' - Begin lowering global precipitation

. - Begin raising water level

/ - Begin lowering water level

\ - Stop world changes

Currently pre-Alpha.
